mapper.insert: insert into signinfo (ObjectID, TypeID, trafficIcon, `Name`, Longitude, Latitude, roadSection, detailedAdd, Jurisdictio, createTime, constructCo, constructCo1, Remark, searchStatu) values (#{objectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trafficicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{roadsection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailedadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jurisdictio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{constructco,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{constructco1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{searchstatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into signinfo
ObjectID,
TypeID,
trafficIcon,
`Name`,
Longitude,
Latitude,
roadSection,
detailedAdd,
Jurisdictio,
createTime,
constructCo,
constructCo1,
Remark,
searchStatu,
#{objectid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{trafficicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{roadsection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{detailedadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jurisdictio,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createtime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{constructco,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{constructco1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{searchstatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select ObjectID,Name,Longitude,Latitude,detailedAdd,Remark,u.trafficIcon2,u.maintenance,u.maintenance1,u.maintenance2,u.maintenance3 FROM signinfo s LEFT JOIN urliconinfo u ON s.trafficIcon=u.trafficIcon LEFT JOIN (select t.sign_OID,t.maintenance,t.maintenance1,t.maintenance2,t.maintenance3 from( select row_number() over (partition by sign_OID order by maintenance desc) as rn,u.* from signmaintenanceinfo u) t where t.rn=1) u ON u.sign_OID=s.ObjectID
